column4: Hello, can someone tell me what the difference is between the 'deb' and deb'-src' prefixes in my repository source list?
If I have a source URL with the 'deb' prefix, do I still need the same URL with the 'deb-src' prefix? Thanks.
the deb lines are for regular packages, while deb-src are for source code packages
the latter removes all package names strting with "scim" and their config foles
